name: Colt Peacemaker
//: Can be vaguely either an original or a reproduction, price based off of MSRP of Uberti Single-Action Cattleman.
description: A third generation reproduction of the legendary Single Action Army, the Colt Peacemaker is one of the first revolvers to use a modern self-contained cartridge.  Made famous by westerns, it is still inn demand for Cowboy Action Shooting, enthusiasts and collectors, and some deem them the greatest gun ever made.
